effect.short: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavorTexts.text:
The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low
altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.
